body.name: EKEN Solar Security Camera Wireless 1080P Surveillance Outdoor WiFi Bullet cam with Spotlights, Cloud Storage, PIR Motion Detection, Color Night Vision, Smart AI Human Detection, 2-Way Audio,
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 16 hrs 17 mins
features: Secure Cloud Service & Weather Resistance: The recorded videos are saved in encrypted cloud, so no need to worry about videos being stolen or damaged caused by a broken memory card. AES-128 data encryption ensures that your footage is kept private on transmission and Storage. With IP65 rated weatherproof housing, it's durable enough to withstand the heat, cold, rain, or sun.

Two-Way Talk & Multi-user Sharing: This Surveillance camera has a built-in speaker and microphone, allowing you to make real-time intercom with mobile phones. You can also share the account with your loved ones and watch the dynamic scenery from the camera together.

Real-time Notifications & PIR Motion Detection: The security camera can be customized sensitivity, "human detection" can distinguish between people and animals / cars to avoid false alerts. When motion is detected, it will send you timely alerts through the app.

1080P Live Video & Color Night Vision: The wireless security camera has a built-in infrared sensor that works automatically when the light is dim. And it comes with 4 spotlights (which can be turned on within the app). It will give you the FHD live video whether it's day or night.

Solar Powered & Wire-Free: EKEN solar security camera contains a rechargeable module battery and can be charged via a solar panel to provide non-stop power. You never have to worry about charging the battery. It is wireless and works with 2.4GHz Wi-Fi. You can simply mount it with the provided screws and wall anchors at anywhere.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.7 4.7 out of 5 stars 9 ratings 4.7 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Effortless Solar-Powered Connectivity Stay connected to your home with EKEN's 100% wire-free, solar-powered security camera. Boasting a 6000mAh rechargeable battery and solar panel, enjoy non-stop surveillance without worrying about battery life. With 2.4 GHz WiFi, 1080p resolution, and IR night vision, monitor your home day and night, no matter where you are. Weather-Resistant IP65 dustproof and waterproof certification ensures the video doorbell can withstand rain, sun, heat, or chill, providing reliable security all year round. Enjoy reliable surveillance, even in extreme weather conditions. Real-Time Two-Way Audio Communicate with loved ones, visitors, or pets using clear two-way audio. EKEN's WiFi security camera facilitates real-time conversations, bringing you closer to home even when you're miles away.

Military-Grade Cloud Storage Secure your footage with AES-128 encrypted cloud storage and choose a subscription plan (sold separately) for enhanced security features. Enjoy a 30-day free trial included in your purchase. .

Advanced AI Human Detection Equipped with a built-in PIR motion sensor, the Wi-Fi security camera sends real-time alerts upon motion detection. With human detection activated, it focuses on human movement, ensuring alerts only when a person - not a pet or car - is nearby. .
1080P & Color Night Vision Experience crystal-clear 1080p Full HD imagery and infrared night vision with the outdoor security camera. Monitor your home day and night, from any location. .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Efficiency and Clarity: Awesome Solar-Powered Camera
reviews.reviewText: The camera captures exceptionally clear video, and the solar panel is highly effective. Up to now, I've never encountered an issue with a low battery. Installation was straightforward as well. I also appreciate the sharpness of the footage during playback. A feature I particularly enjoy is the ability to communicate through the camera. The solar panel is convenient, eliminating the need to take down the camera for battery changes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Solid quality but just remember you get what you pay for
reviews.reviewText: I like everything about this Camera but I just wish they would put slightly better hardware and/or software in them but then again, these are very budget friendly so I understand why they aren't top notch. The video glitches a little even with the strong WiFi signal so if you need to place this Camera where the WiFi is still solid, just not strong, the Camera struggles to keep up. I have Ultra plan with Spectrum (500 mbps) with a WiFi 6 Mesh system and there's strong signal throughout my house. All devices, at any point in my home or outside border of my home, never see under 300 mbps when tested so my Internet is not the issue for the glitches. I run the EKEN doorbell and Light Bulb Cameras as well and they all exhibit the same issues... However, they still run good enough for my needs and the Cloud Subscriptions are VERY cost effective so I will continue to use and recommend EKEN. I just can't give any of their products 5 Stars at this time.

reviews.reviewText: Was easy to install but the sound is weak but over all 10 out of 10
